detaileddescription.para: DHCP hardware type, currently only ethernet is supported

memberdef.name: DHCP_OPTION_LEASE_TIME
memberdef.initializer: 51 /* RFC 2132 9.2, time in seconds, in 4 bytes */

memberdef.name: DHCP_OPTION_OVERLOAD
memberdef.initializer: 52 /* RFC2132 9.3, use file and/or sname field for options */

detaileddescription.para: make sure user does not configure this too small allow this to be configured in lwipopts.h, but not too small set this to be sufficient for your options in outgoing DHCP msgs
